org.odk.collect.android.formentry

Class FormIndexAnimationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.odk.collect.android.formentry.FormIndexAnimationHandler

  • public class FormIndexAnimationHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for determining how a new "screen" in a form should be animated to based on the FormIndex.
